results.name: baseline:hardened:process_info_allow:pidinfo-self
command:
import ctypes, ctypes.util, os, sys
lib = ctypes.CDLL(ctypes.util.find_library('proc'))
lib.proc_pidinfo.argtypes = [ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_int, ctypes.c_uint64, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_int]
lib.proc_pidinfo.restype = ctypes.c_int
PROC_PIDTBSDINFO = 3
pid_arg = sys.argv[1]
pid = os.getpid() if pid_arg == 'self' else int(pid_arg)
buf = ctypes.create_string_buffer(512)
rc = lib.proc_pidinfo(pid, PROC_PIDTBSDINFO, 0, buf, ctypes.sizeof(buf))
sys.exit(0 if rc > 0 else 1)

results.name: baseline:hardened:notifications:deny-allowed-distributed
command:
import ctypes, sys
cf = ctypes.CDLL('/System/Library/Frameworks/CoreFoundation.framework/CoreFoundation')
cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
center = cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter()
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int]
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
kCFStringEncodingUTF8 = 0x08000100
name = sys.argv[1].encode('utf-8')
cfname = cf.CFStringCreateWithCString(None, name, kCFStringEncodingUTF8)
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_bool]
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification(center, cfname, None, None, True)

results.name: baseline:hardened:notifications:deny-distributed
command:
import ctypes, sys
cf = ctypes.CDLL('/System/Library/Frameworks/CoreFoundation.framework/CoreFoundation')
cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
center = cf.CFNotificationCenterGetDistributedCenter()
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_char_p, ctypes.c_int]
cf.CFStringCreateWithCString.restype = ctypes.c_void_p
kCFStringEncodingUTF8 = 0x08000100
name = sys.argv[1].encode('utf-8')
cfname = cf.CFStringCreateWithCString(None, name, kCFStringEncodingUTF8)
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification.argtypes = [ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_void_p, ctypes.c_bool]
cf.CFNotificationCenterPostNotification(center, cfname, None, None, True)

results.name: baseline:hardened:signal_self_allow:signal-same-sandbox
command:
import os, subprocess, sys
proc = subprocess.Popen(['/bin/sleep', '1'])
try:
    os.kill(proc.pid, 0)
except Exception:
    proc.wait()
    sys.exit(1)
proc.wait()
sys.exit(0)
